source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_00<tab>Mogson looks like he's forgotten something again.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_00<tab>アサー天空廊のモグソンは、忘れ物に気がついたようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_01<tab>It appears that the absent-minded Mogson has left his baskets behind again, this time in Tharl Oom Khash. Recover them for the poor moogle so he can stop fluttering about in distress.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_01<tab>モグソンの話を聞いた。危険な場所に忘れ物をしたので、取ってきてほしいという。ドラヴァニア雲海のサルウーム・カシュで「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEE01 /var>」を3個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_02<tab>You find the baskets scattered around Tharl Oom Khash, and it is a mystery how the tiny moogle expected to carry them back in the first place. Return to Mogson and deliver his precious baskets back to him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8AEE01 /var>を入手した。アサー天空廊の「モグソン」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_03<tab>Mogson is delighted to have the baskets returned to him, grateful that he can resume crafting with the crystals stored inside the baskets. It seems that a distant dragon's roar scared the moogle off while he was gathering the crystals. Now, thanks to you, the nervous moogle can resume crafting whatever it is he makes.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_03<tab>モグソンに忘れ物を届けた。どうやら、サルウーム・カシュまでクリスタルを採りに行ったものの、怖くて帰ってきてしまったようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_000<tab>Oh no, I've done it again, kupo. I've forgotten my baskets! Please, adventurer, find them for me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_000ありゃりゃ……また、編みカゴを置いてきちゃったくぽ……？
よかったら、見つけて持ってきてほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_001<tab>I forgot three baskets around Tharl Oom Khash. Find them before the monsters get into them!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_001置き忘れた場所は、「サルウーム・カシュ」くぽ。
「」を3個、回収してくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_010<tab>Those baskets are precious to me. Find them around Tharl Oom Khash, kupo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_010置き忘れた場所は、「サルウーム・カシュ」くぽ。
「」を3個、回収してくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_020<tab>If I don't get those baskets back, this whole day will have been a waste, kupo! Were you able to recover them?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_020置き忘れた場所は、「サルウーム・カシュ」くぽ。
「」を3個、回収してくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_021<tab>My baskets! Thank heavens you found them, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_021くぽ！
これがなくて困ってたくぽ。
ありがとうくぽ！　よく忘れて困るくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_032<tab>I went to Tharl Oom Khash to gather crystals for my crafting, but then I heard a dragon roar in the distance and ran off, leaving my baskets behind, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_032実は、物作りに使うためのクリスタルを、
サルウーム・カシュに取りに行ったくぽ。
……でも、怖くなって、途中で帰ってきちゃったくぽ。
